title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 115.3 - Reimbursement for property paid
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 115.3 - Reimbursement for property paid

State Regulations

An entity which has paid to the State Comptroller abandoned
property pursuant to section
1315
of
the Abandoned Property Law may make payment to the person entitled thereto, and
may file claim for reimbursement for such payment by the State Comptroller, who
shall, upon satisfactory proof of such payment and after audit, reimburse such
entity. Such reimbursement shall be limited to the amount paid the State

Comptroller by such entity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
115.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
